author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Tamil Nadu Maanila Congress (M) has demanded that the Union government accept the “fair demands” of the nurses of Employees State Insurance Corporation hospitals and secondary grade teachers.

In a release, party president G.K. Vasan said the teachers were on a fast for the past week demanding equal pay as per the Seventh Pay Commission. The protests were hurting the students, especially at a time when exams are approaching, he said.

Teachers in government-run primary and middle schools in the State have been demanding equal pay for all government teachers, and it is a genuine demand, he said.
title: TMC supports nurses, teachers
